results.title: Trial of heparin versus atenolol in prevention of myocardial infarction in intermediate coronary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Trial of @CHEMICAL_Heparin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006493 @@@heparin@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in prevention of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ in intermediate @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@coronary syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Telford AM, Wilson C. Trial of heparin versus atenolol in prevention of myocardial infarction in intermediate coronary syndrome. Lancet. 1981 Jun 6;1(8232):1225-8. PMID: 6112564

results.title: Influence of cardiopulmonary bypass on the plasma concentrations of atenolol.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: In view of its cardio-selectivity and low-variability, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ should be used as the first-choice drug for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary syndrome@@@ and other @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Leite Fda S, dos Santos LM, Bonafé WW, Chignalia AZ, Carmona MJ, Suyama MJ, Malbouisson LM, Auler JO Jr, Santos SR. Influence of cardiopulmonary bypass on the plasma concentrations of atenolol. Arq Bras Cardiol. 2007 Jun;88(6):637-42. PMID: 17664990
